r.d:
This extension provides bindings to the Swish-e API.
Swish-e is a GPL licensed search engine, with a clause that allows applications to link against the libswish-e library to use the published API to do so without invoking the viral portion of the GPL. This is subject to returning a link back to the swish-e source code.
Here it is: http://swish-e.org
r.n: - Added missing IN_ALL constant. - Changed constants to be class constants. - Fixed Swish::__construct() to prevent calling it twice.
